description: Retrieves a paginated list of Greengrass core devices.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The core device status by which to filter. If you specify this parameter, the list includes only core devices that have this status. Choose one of the following options: HEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software and all components run on the core device without issue. UNHEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software or a component is in a failed state on the core device.

parameters.name: runtime
parameters.description: The runtime to be used by the core device. The runtime can be: aws_nucleus_classic aws_nucleus_lite.

nested_items.name: coreDevices
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each core device.

nested_items.name: coreDeviceThingName
nested_items.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the core device. Core devices can have the following statuses:
HEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software and all components run on the core device without issue.
UNHEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software or a component is in a failed state on the core device.

nested_items.name: lastStatusUpdateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the core device's status last updated, expressed in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The operating system platform that the core device runs.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The computer architecture of the core device.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: The runtime for the core device. The runtime can be:

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
